title: is this good
body:
Illaoi  
4W 2L    67%  win rate   7.3 kill     11.5 deaths    6.2assist     1.17:1 kda  200.5 cs    14,305 gold

1000 mmr

replies.body:
CS depends on game time. Need CS per minute stat instead.
If you are using OP.GG its the number in the brackets next to your cs. You want to average 7-10 cs per min.

Way too many deaths imo. If you average more than 5-6 deaths (unless you're Karthus or something) you need to look at how you play.
I know tanks are frontliners, but it suggests you don't know when to back out.
You really want to aim for 2.0 KDA
screw that u cant climb with that champ. Play some yi.
I went from bronze 5 to bronze 3 in a few days playing il
1000 MMR is going to place you in bronze.
Where's your Illaoi gameplay philosophy matey? Stats are good to know, but knowing what to do is even better! ; )
if you have a good pushing team go top push like cray and let bot get inhib lol
Lower your average deaths to roughly 5 and then ye that's pretty good.

Less then 2 KDA, 11 death average, you would probably have to look at the other factors to actually be able to tell.

EG. Towers/inhibs taken, CS per minute, and even things that can't be seen from outside the game (are you taking all the pressure top and letting your bot and mid go insane)

yer I norms tell my team to just go not and push then its a 4v3 bot as I always take 2 top wen playing il don't get much tower or inhib as I let adc get it for gold I'm wining 50+% of games had a bad losing streak tho that's why it ses 45%
